name: CNBCTechCheck
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CNBC’s Tech Check brings you the latest in tech news from CNBC’s 1 Market in the heart of San Francisco. Tech Check keeps you up to speed on the largest technology companies, cybersecurity, social media, electronics, robotics and mobile technology.
Add the CNBC Tech Check to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
After adding the CNBC Tech Check, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest.
Don't forget to check out all of CNBC's Flash Briefings on Alexa, including Mad Money Cramer Remix, CNBC Markets Now, and more. Just search for "CNBC" in the Alexa Skill Store.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
